content.question: Describe the concept of a primate city.Describe ONE similarity and ONE difference between primate cities and megacities.Describe ONE way in which primate cities are important within their countries.Explain ONE reason why the United States does not have a primate city.Explain why having a primate city can negatively affect the economic development of a country.Explain why primate cities may not comply with the rank-size rule.

frqParts.text: Describe the concept of a primate city.Describe ONE similarity and ONE difference between primate cities and megacities.Describe ONE way in which primate cities are important within their countries.Explain ONE reason why the United States does not have a primate city.Explain why having a primate city can negatively affect the economic development of a country.Explain why primate cities may not comply with the rank-size rule.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 6.4: The Size and Distribution of Cities

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
